Articles.Content:
Hey guys!~l am mochiSD and l'm not good to eat!!!!!! This is very important!!!!!!

First time to play this game in 2014 ,but just play 3 months.and l really like this game.So when l finish my high school life l will back to play.

And say hello to everyone!!!!!!

Hello mochiSD, and welcome to the forums!

Good to see you're enjoying the game. Glad to have you aboard.

Happy landings!

Welcome!

You're not snacks? *puts back down.*

It is good that you can discipline yourself to not play too much KSP in High School. I speak from experience and my 4th period study hall.

Have fun here!
